title: Premium for granting such additional BUA beyond permissible FSI as per Table No
clause_text: Premium for granting such additional BUA beyond permissible FSI as per Table No.6-G shall be charged at the rate of 50% of ASR for land and shall be equally shared between the GoM and the Authority. Provision of Inclusive Housing shall not be applicable for development in CBD.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
